Love love love it! I got this app because of my teenage daughter. I am not a computer inclined persone and I was looking for something easy to crop pictures with. she assured me picsart would be easy.... it did take me a while to figure it out (and even longer to find out I could see other pics too) but now I don't send or post pics without using it. So much so that now my mother is using it! Love love love picsart!
